tool_description: API to manage your position on crypto currency
name: Crypto grana
title: Crypto grana

api_list.name: List histories
List position for each crypto
api_list.description: List your current position for each crypto
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-grana.p.rapidapi.com/positions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-grana.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Add new history crypto
api_list.description: Add a new history crypto agreement with you buy or sell a crypto.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-grana.p.rapidapi.com/histories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-grana.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
